Package lu.softec.maven.mavenizer

Class Summary
AbstractArchiveMavenizerMojo Base class for Mavenizer mojo providing paramater specific to archive and analysis operations
AbstractMavenizerMojo Base class for Mavenizer mojo providing paramater shared by all mojos.
AbstractMavenizerMojo.TimeRange Utility class representing a time range
AbstractPomMavenizerMojo Base class for Mavenizer mojo providing paramater specific to pom operations
CleanAnalysisMojo Delete the mavenizer analysis results (xml and pom)
DependencyAnalyserMojo Analyse dependencies between binaries of the project.
FileDeployerMojo Deploy the binaries of the project with their generated POM to a remote repository
FileInstallerMojo Install the binaries of the project with their generated POM to a local repository
HelpMojo Display help information on maven-mavenizer-plugin.
Call
PomGeneratorMojo Create POM files based on the dependency analysis
RemoteArchiveExtractorMojo Download and extract the binaries of the project
